name: Ch19ABaseConvo4
_source: speak;Joshua;Come on, Gilliam!|You can't hit what you can't touch!|Speed and evasion win battles every time.
speak;Gilliam;Nonsense.|A strong defense is the foundation of any good military strategy.|Armor has saved my life countless times.
speak;Gilliam;What good is dodging if one mistake means death?|Better to withstand the blow and counter.
speak;Joshua;And what good is armor when you're too slow to reach the enemy?|I'd rather not get hit at all than rely on metal to save me.
speak;Gilliam;Your gambling mindset shows in your tactics, Joshua.|Defense is reliable. Dodging is a gamble.
speak;Joshua;Life is a gamble, my friend!|And I always bet on myself.
speak;Eirika;What are you two discussing so intensely?
speak;Gilliam;Your Highness, perhaps you can settle this debate.|We're discussing battle tactics.
speak;Gilliam;I maintain that a strong defense is the best approach.|To withstand attacks and protect one's allies.
speak;Joshua;While I say that avoiding attacks altogether is superior.|Why take damage when you can dodge it?
speak;Eirika;Well, both approaches have their merits...
speak;Joshua;But if you had to choose, Princess?|Which do you believe is more effective?
choice;What does Eirika believe is more effective?;Defense - A strong defense is more reliable.;Avoid - Dodging attacks is more effective.
option;Defense - A strong defense is more reliable.
speak;Eirika;I believe there's wisdom in Gilliam's approach.|A strong defense protects not only yourself, but those around you.
speak;Gilliam;Well said, Your Highness.|Defense forms the backbone of Renais' military tradition.
speak;Joshua;Hmm, outnumbered I see.|Still, I'll stick to my ways.
speak;Eirika;That's what makes our group strong, Joshua.|Different approaches for different situations.
speak;Gilliam;I'll continue to be your shield, Princess.|You can count on my defense.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Gilliam.|And Joshua, your skills are equally valuable to us.
speak;Joshua;Care to make a small wager on whose approach works better in the next battle?
option;Avoid - Dodging attacks is more effective.
speak;Eirika;I find myself agreeing with Joshua.|In my training, I've learned that avoiding a blow entirely is often the best option.
speak;Joshua;Ha! The princess has excellent taste in tactics!|Did you hear that, Gilliam?
speak;Gilliam;With respect, Your Highness...|Not everyone has your natural agility.
speak;Eirika;You make a valid point, Gilliam.|Perhaps the best approach depends on one's natural abilities.
speak;Gilliam;A diplomatic answer, Princess.|I can respect that.
speak;Joshua;Still, I think this calls for a celebration!|How about a friendly wager, Gilliam?
speak;Gilliam;Is gambling your answer to everything?
speak;Joshua;Only the important things!|Plus, the thrill of the bet makes victory that much sweeter!
speak;Eirika;Please try not to bet away all our funds, Joshua.|We still need to buy supplies.
speak;Joshua;Don't worry, Princess.|I only bet what I can afford to lose... usually.
